reviews.review_msg: Whatley is an amazingly skilled teacher. I took a few courses with him years ago, and I still find myself realizing now and then the things I learned from him that have made me a better writer. He genuinely cares about students, and will bend over backwards to help you if you show a sincere interest. One of the best professors I've had.

He is a great prof, a tough marker, demands alot our of his students at least in the upper divisions or when he is your tutorial leader but he makes you want to do the work.  I decided to become an english major after taking a class with him and am always look for classes that he is teaching.
